or
Login
Login
Don’t have an account? Register
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {AuthentificationRequest} from '../../../services/models/authentification-request'; import {AuthentificationService} from '../../../services/services/authentification.service'; import {Router} from '@angular/router'; import {TokenService} from "../../../services/token/token.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'] }) export class LoginComponent { authRequest: AuthentificationRequest = {email: '', motDePasse: ''}; errorMsg: Array = []; constructor(private authService: AuthentificationService, private router: Router, private tokenService: TokenService ) { } // tslint:disable-next-line:typedef login() { this.errorMsg = []; this.authService.authenticate({ body: this.authRequest }).subscribe({ next: (res) => { // this.tokenService.token = res.token as string; this.router.navigate(['books']); }, error: (err) => { console.log(err); if (err.error.validationErrors) { this.errorMsg = err.error.validationErrors; } else { this.errorMsg.push(err.error.error); } } }); } }
